ModMetaData.name: Ferrex Race (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Xen
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/buuPQel.png[/img] Update of Xens mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2018387954
- Added Royalty faction goodwill patch - Added back the Hiring Console - Increased the combat power of the more basic pawns a bit to not make them to numerous - Added compatibility with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1542399915]SwimmingKit[/url] - Removed the crafting of the weapons for balance, via PlayerEmers - Weapons are now behind tech-print research, via Röstli - More starting scenarios, via Röstli
[img]https://i.imgur.com/pufA0kM.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/FerrexRace][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/WjDSfUn.png[/img][/td] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/6KqTKks.png[/img][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2288125657][img]https://i.imgur.com/kNldlMg.png[/img][/url]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img]
The Ferrex are a ferret(Mustelid) humanoid species. This race is attributed with a great degree of business acumen! Uses the Alien Framework V2.0 by Erdelf and co.
Art by Xen. Inspired largely by Ekksu's great ferret art for the Animal collab project!
[img]https://i.imgur.com/PwoNOj4.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [/list]
